org.apache.flink.runtime.state

接口 CheckpointStreamFactory

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FsCheckpointStreamFactory, FsSavepointStreamFactory, MemCheckpointStreamFactory

    public interface CheckpointStreamFactory

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream
      A dedicated output stream that produces a StreamStateHandle when closed.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void close()
      Closes the stream factory, releasing all internal resources, but does not delete any persistent checkpoint data.
      CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream createCheckpointStateOutputStream(long checkpointID, long timestamp)
      Creates an new CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream.

    • 方法详细资料

      • createCheckpointStateOutputStream

        CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream createCheckpointStateOutputStream(long checkpointID,
                                                                                      long timestamp)
                                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates an new CheckpointStreamFactory.CheckpointStateOutputStream. When the stream is closed, it returns a state handle that can retrieve the state back.
        参数:
        checkpointID - The ID of the checkpoint.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the checkpoint.
        返回:
        An output stream that writes state for the given checkpoint.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions may occur while creating the stream and should be forwarded.

      • close

        void close()
    throws java.lang.Exception
        Closes the stream factory, releasing all internal resources, but does not delete any persistent checkpoint data.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exceptions can be forwarded and will be logged by the system
